article.headline: Robert Morris 69, Sacred Heart 66
article.story: FAIRFIELD, Conn. (AP) -- Chaz McCrommon scored 25 points and grabbed seven rebounds as Robert Morris held off a late rally to beat Sacred Heart 69-66 in a Northeast Conference game Saturday. Maurice Carter added 20 points, including five key free throws down the stretch. He also had eight rebounds for Robert Morris (7-8, 4-2 NEC). Sacred Heart (7-9, 3-4) has lost three straight games. The Pioneers trailed by eight points with 1:05 to play but rallied and nearly forced overtimed. Sacred Heart trailed by three with time running out, but Omar Wellington forgot his team needed a 3-point basket and drove to the hoop. Time ran out after he missed the short shot. Maurice Bailey led the Pioneers with 21 points and Wellington scored 16. Sacred Heart led by as many as 11 points in the first half.
